txt.en: The miner Inir was wounded during the attempt to flee the Barnavon Mine, but managed to hide from the bugan.

'Ah! I never thought to see the face of [placeholder] in this mine, for there are so many of the filthy bugan! Will you help me to escape?\n\n'I can offer no reward, but perhaps Cada will part with something?'
Inir awaits rescue in the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should escort Inir to the mine entrance.
'Aye, Inir has returned already, and his wounds are being tended.\n\n'You have our gratitude, [placeholder].'
Cada is outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should return to Cada with news of Inir's rescue.
'I am ready to go... lead on, friend!'
Talk to Cada at the mine
